akn:section.akn:heading: New Convention Center Hotel project-deed and recordation tax exemption.

akn:content.akn:p: For the purposes of this section, the term:

All transfers of real property in the New Convention Center Hotel TIF Area pursuant to the project and through the date that is 6 months after the effective date of the lease authorized under [part C of subchapter I of Chapter 12 of Title 10] and any transfer by the District of Lot 45 in Square 374 in connection with the project shall be exempt from the taxes imposed by §§ 42-1103 and 47-903.
